459fe927-d645-4d27-8fe3-8d704b579908.name: deployment_environment
459fe927-d645-4d27-8fe3-8d704b579908.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment_environment') AS deployment_environment
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE metric_name = 'elasticsearch_node_cluster_connections'
GROUP BY deployment_environment

4705c239-e3a3-43e5-a6c4-60284f78ab77.name: elasticsearch_node_name
4705c239-e3a3-43e5-a6c4-60284f78ab77.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'elasticsearch_node_name') AS elasticsearch_node_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE metric_name = 'elasticsearch_node_cluster_connections'
GROUP BY elasticsearch_node_name

8ba59bf3-c879-4dce-8075-61c140a2dde5.name: elasticsearch_cluster_name
8ba59bf3-c879-4dce-8075-61c140a2dde5.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'elasticsearch_cluster_name') AS elasticsearch_cluster_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4
WHERE metric_name = 'elasticsearch_node_cluster_connections'
GROUP BY elasticsearch_cluster_name

widgets.description:
Shows the overall health of the Elasticsearch cluster.
Health status is based on the state of its primary and replica shards.
      Green indicates all shards are assigned.
      Yellow indicates that one or more replica shards are unassigned.
      Red indicates that one or more primary shards are unassigned, making some data unavailable.
widgets.title: Cluster Health Status

widgets.description: Displays the number of active shards in the cluster.
widgets.title: Cluster Active Shards

widgets.description: Shows the number of pending tasks for the cluster.
widgets.title: Cluster Pending Tasks

widgets.description: Displays the total document count across all indices.
widgets.title: Index Document Count

widgets.description: Shows the number of cache evictions.
widgets.title: Cache Evictions
